com.redhat.rhn.frontend.action.configuration.channel
Class BaseCopyToAction

java.lang.Object
  Action
      com.redhat.rhn.frontend.struts.RhnAction
          com.redhat.rhn.frontend.action.configuration.channel.BaseCopyToAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
Copy2ChannelsAction, Copy2SystemsAction
public abstract class BaseCopyToAction
extends RhnAction

BaseCopyToAction Copying, whether to local or global channels, looks pretty much the same. This class handles all the common code
